channel.title: ShadowNode Modded Game Servers
channel.description: Recent content on ShadowNode Modded Game Servers

item.title: How to Join
item.description: Jump In and Join The Fun Our Server IPs Our Rules Suggested Launchers FTB App CurseForge There used to be a number of choices as to what launchers you could use to connect to servers with, however, we've curated the above links and guides to enable you to be able to connect to our servers successfully. If you need further assistance with using one of the launchers listed above please feel free to join our Discord and ask for help in the support section.

item.title: Wiki
item.description: Commands Guides Join our Servers Chunk Loaders In this category you will find all commands, guides, rules and answers to questions you may have about our server! As always you can also ask for help in our Discord.

item.title: Modpack Tips
item.description: 1.16 vs 1.12 Packs POZ3 MC Eternal Check out the links above for some of our popular tips as well as the navigation menu for more options. As always you can also ask for help in our Discord.

item.title: Legacy Info
item.description: Legacy Info The information on these following pages is kept as legacy content from old servers, launchers, and guides that may no longer be valid. Please use caution when using anything within this section.
